judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
jmi
NOTICE OF MOTION NO.1963 OF 2000
IN
CONTEMPT NOTICE OF MOTION NO.929 OF 1995
IN
COMPANY PETITION NO.128 OF 1985.
Mahendra Kumar Sanghi.
..Petitioner.
vs.
Ratankumar Sanghi & Ors.
..Respondents/Applicants.
And
Sanghi Motors (Bombay) & Ors.
..Contemnors.
....
Mr. Namay Dave, i/b. B. Munim & Co., for Contemnors.
Mr. Rajeev Ravi, i/b. Bilawala & Co., for Respondent Nos.1,3 & 29.
....
CORAM : S.J.KATHAWALLA, J.
DATE : 29TH AUGUST 2009.
P.C.
Office   is   directed   to   allow   the   parties   to   submit   a 
complete set of papers which upon submission be treated as the 
reconstructed record of this Court.   The learned Advocates for the 
parties have informed the Court that they will submit all the papers 
alongwith the orders passed in the above matters from time to time for 
the purpose of reconstruction of the record within a period of one 
week from today.
.
Place the notice of motion no.1963 of 2000 alongwith 
contempt notice of motion no.929 of 1995 in company petition no.128 
of 1985 on 4
th September 2009 for directions.

[ S.J.KATHAWALLA, J. ]
